messages.messageBody:
>Your computer thinks it's 2 weeks ago so my email program sorted your posts
down to the bottom of the list with the stuff I haven't deleted yet. So I

I hadn't realized, Thanks for telling me.

Joy(ce)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Two Joyces!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, now I see your posts! That s why another Joyce didn t register. Your computer thinks it s 2 weeks ago so my email program sorted your posts down to the
messages.messageBody:
on 8/2/02 1:14 PM, Cmkerin at cmkerin@... wrote:

> I think we're both on another list too, I saw a post by the other Joyce.
> <g>

Oh, now I see your posts! That's why another Joyce didn't register. Your
computer thinks it's 2 weeks ago so my email program sorted your posts down
to the bottom of the list with the stuff I haven't deleted yet. So I never
read them!

Welcome! :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Two Joyces!
messages.msgSnippet: ... There are 2 Joyces posting now. Twice the fun. Life is good. ~Mary _________________________________________________________________ Send and receive
messages.messageBody:
>>Not sure how my name got attached to that but it wasn't a quote from me.
>
>Joyce>>

There are 2 Joyces posting now. Twice the fun.

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Two Joyces!
messages.msgSnippet: I think we re both on another list too, I saw a post by the other Joyce.  I joined this group a few months ago with an intro. but I m usually quiet and I ve
messages.messageBody:
I think we're both on another list too, I saw a post by the other Joyce.
<g>

I joined this group a few months ago with an intro. but I'm usually quiet
and I've even subbed and resubbed at times. The number of posts can get
overwhelming at times. ;)

Joyce (maybe I could use joy just for this list)
